nodes.bodyText:
We don't need to say "if true" for boolean properties, as that's redundant. Let's phrase this as

Include UUID in the table location
looks really better, thanks
Not needed since this returns a primitive
removed, thanks

Should we remove the dashes? Compare

my_table-1ec297aa2e8511eb9dfe7bf8d2aea93a
my_table_1ec297aa-2e85-11eb-9dfe-7bf8d2aea93a
yes, without dashes looks better. Removed dashes and moved generation of unique table name to separate private method
Wrap the argument, since all other arguments are wrapped
Not sure that I understand comment correct, but moved  boolean useUniqueTableLocation to the next line
tableName + "-" + UUID.randomUUID().toString().replace("-", "")
Append  randomUUID to table location
"Use randomized, unique table locations"
@findepi sure, I will rebase this brach, add code fixes and tests in next few days

The test class cannot be executed in threads, because the table name is shared between tests.
Instead of making it single-threaded, use different table name in each test method.
ok, I will change it
done
would it work to use io.trino.plugin.hive.HiveTestUtils.HDFS_ENVIRONMENT instead?
removed HdfsEnvironment at all
what is this for?
removed it

We can use iceberg.default schema, so that we don't have to setup things.
actually, the QueryRunner should have iceberg catalog, and the chosen schema set as session's default, so that you don't need to qualify tables in all the queries
done
Would io.trino.plugin.iceberg.IcebergQueryRunner#createIcebergQueryRunner work?
yes, just added ability to pass custom iceberg catalog properties

Please update formatting

all parameters on one line OR each parameter on its own line (including the first one)
for indentation please refer to https://github.com/airlift/codestyle/
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -66,11 +67,21 @@ public static DistributedQueryRunner createIcebergQueryRunner(Map<String, String
         return createIcebergQueryRunner(extraProperties, format, tables, Optional.empty());
     }
 
+    public static DistributedQueryRunner createIcebergQueryRunner(Map<String, String> extraProperties,
+                                                                  FileFormat format,
+                                                                  List<TpchTable<?>> tables,
+                                                                  Optional<File> metastoreDirectory)

nodes.bodyText:
We call it connectorProperties in other XxxQueryRunner classes.
also, no need for optional, since empty map has the same meaning
           Map<String, String> connectorProperties)

also, please add it right after extraProperties (also seems usual)
done

Why two levels of nesting?
Would it be fine to have just
metastoreDir = Files.createTempDirectory("....");

?
however, it seems the test doesn't need to know the metastoreDir, so instead of setting it up (and cleaning it later), it should be sufficient to pass Optional.empty() for the metastoreDir, right?

we need metastoreDir because it is used in createTestingFileHiveMetastore(metastoreDir),
but I removed two levels nesting

use default
new IcebergConfig().getFileFormat()
as a follow up we should remove format parameter and use the new connectorProperties instead
replaced with new IcebergConfig().getFileFormat()

Do not use assertTrue with complex expressions. In case of failure, it produces unhelpful message.
Use
[org.assertj.core.api.Assertions.] assertThat(location).matches(....);

instead
done
